Title: Day One
Plot: It's Gwen's first day on the job, and it's not going very well. After accidentally releasing a mysterious gas from a comet that landed, a new type of alien is let loose on the streets - an alien that's addicted to sex. Torchwood must find the inhabited body, and prevent anymore deaths from the violent form of sex.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Sara Gregory, Felicity Rhys, Alex Parry, Adrian  Christopher, Ross O'Hennessy, Ceri Mears, Justin McDonald, Brendan Charleson, Rob Storr, Donald Longdon, Naomi Martell, Tom Price, Mark Heal, Paul Kasey
